mapper.select: select seq, title, startdate, enddate, thumbnail from tb_api_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_api_date (seq, title, startdate, enddate, place, realmname, thumbnail, gpsx, gpsy) VALUES(#{seq}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realmname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumbnail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gpsx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gpsy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
